name: Heli Strike
description:
Attack helicopter simulations game featuring a fully clickable cokpit and multifunctional displays.  The current game features a single desert map with a few targets to shoot at (and they will shoot back).

Features:

  • Fully clickable cockpit
  • Targeting pod for laser designating targets
  • MFD's with a variety of pages
  • Assortment of weapons 
    • Unguided Rockets
    • Guided Missiles
    • Autocannon (planned)
  • Variety of Maps (1 currently available)
    • Desert 
    • Naval (In progress)
    • Jungle (planned)

More components inside the cockpit are planned as its currenlty looking it bit bare bones as well as an in depth damage model that simulates different parts getting damaged. the physics are a little rough around the edges but fixes are in progress. Feedback is greatly appreciated.
